title:PvE Podcast 150 Kepler weapons
description:Season 27 Kepler world weapons with the Exhaustive Research Origin Trait

// Giver's Blessing - PvE Minors god 1
// (Fluted Barrel, Smallbore, Arrowhead Brake, Chambered Compensator, Corkscrew Rifling, Polygonal Rifling), (High-Caliber Rounds, Armor-Piercing Rounds, Ricochet Rounds, Alloy Mag, Extended Mag, Appended Mag, Flared Magwell, Light Mag), (Rewind Rounds), (Kinetic Tremors, One for All)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing minor add groups both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content. Giver's Blessing is a rapid fire frame, which provides a useful reload animation modifier of from ×0.9 at half-full to ×0.8 when the magazine's empty. At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are a bit low but, at that's helped at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that Range of 33 translates to 14.88m hipfire and 23.80m ADS before damage drop-off, 53 Stability is ×1.1031 flinch resistance, 38 Handling is 0.41s ready, 0.32s ADS and 0.38s stow speed, 47 Reload Speed is a 1.94s reload (1.55s when empty, with the frame intrinsic) and Magazine Size is 47 (max 70). Controller players will probably need a bit of assistance from the barrel perk to control the recoil, but M+KB can focus on boosting handling. As the magazine perk, the combat effect rounds are all here, or look to boost magazine size or Reload Speed. In the first trait perk column, Rewind Rounds turns this into a bullet hose refilling 60% (70% when enhanced) of hits back into the magazine when empty, and pairs well with both Kinetic Tremors for 6m AoE damage after 12 hits (11 enhanced) to help deal with add crowds, or One for All for a ×1.35 damage boost for 10s (11s enhanced) just for hitting three enemies, to help kill chunkier enemies. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller

dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1392496348,679225683,3418782618,3891536761
dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1392496348,679225683,3418782618,4049631843

// Giver's Blessing - PvE Minors god 2
// (Fluted Barrel, Smallbore, Arrowhead Brake, Chambered Compensator, Corkscrew Rifling, Polygonal Rifling), (High-Caliber Rounds, Armor-Piercing Rounds, Ricochet Rounds, Alloy Mag, Extended Mag, Appended Mag, Flared Magwell, Light Mag), (Shoot to Loot), (Kinetic Tremors, One for All)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing minor add groups both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content. Giver's Blessing is a rapid fire frame, which provides a useful reload animation modifier of from ×0.9 at half-full to ×0.8 when the magazine's empty. At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are a bit low but, at that's helped at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that Range of 33 translates to 14.88m hipfire and 23.80m ADS before damage drop-off, 53 Stability is ×1.1031 flinch resistance, 38 Handling is 0.41s ready, 0.32s ADS and 0.38s stow speed, 47 Reload Speed is a 1.94s reload (1.55s when empty, with the frame intrinsic) and Magazine Size is 47 (max 70). Controller players will probably need a bit of assistance from the barrel perk to control the recoil, but M+KB can focus on boosting handling. As the magazine perk, the combat effect rounds are all here, or look to boost magazine size or Reload Speed. In the first trait perk column, Shoot to Loot is very useful in endgame content to pick up ammo and orbs from safety. In the second column, Kinetic Tremors provides 6m AoE damage after 12 hits (11 enhanced) to help deal with add crowds and also proc Shoot to Loot's ammo/orb pickup, or One for All for a ×1.35 damage boost for 10s (11s enhanced) just for hitting three enemies, to help kill chunkier enemies. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller
dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1840239774,1561002382,3700496672,3891536761
dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1840239774,1561002382,3700496672,4049631843

dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1392496348,1431678320,3700496672,4049631843
dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1392496348,2420895100,3700496672,3891536761
dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1392496348,2420895100,3700496672,4049631843
dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1392496348,1087426260,3700496672,3891536761
dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1392496348,1087426260,3700496672,4049631843
dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1392496348,3230963543,3700496672,3891536761
dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1392496348,3230963543,3700496672,4049631843
dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1392496348,679225683,3700496672,3891536761
dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1392496348,679225683,3700496672,4049631843

// Giver's Blessing - PvE Minors god 3
// (Fluted Barrel, Smallbore, Arrowhead Brake, Chambered Compensator, Corkscrew Rifling, Polygonal Rifling), (High-Caliber Rounds, Armor-Piercing Rounds, Ricochet Rounds, Alloy Mag, Extended Mag, Appended Mag, Flared Magwell, Light Mag), (Demolitionist), (Kinetic Tremors, One for All, Adrenaline Junkie)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing minor add groups both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content. Giver's Blessing is a rapid fire frame, which provides a useful reload animation modifier of from ×0.9 at half-full to ×0.8 when the magazine's empty. At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are a bit low but, at that's helped at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that Range of 33 translates to 14.88m hipfire and 23.80m ADS before damage drop-off, 53 Stability is ×1.1031 flinch resistance, 38 Handling is 0.41s ready, 0.32s ADS and 0.38s stow speed, 47 Reload Speed is a 1.94s reload (1.55s when empty, with the frame intrinsic) and Magazine Size is 47 (max 70). Controller players will probably need a bit of assistance from the barrel perk to control the recoil, but M+KB can focus on boosting handling. As the magazine perk, the combat effect rounds are all here, or look to boost magazine size or Reload Speed. In the first trait perk column, Demolitionist is great for generating grenade ability energy, and also to refill the magazine on grenade usage. In the second column, Kinetic Tremors provides 6m AoE damage after 12 hits (11 enhanced) to help deal with add crowds, or One for All generates a ×1.35 damage boost for 10s (11s enhanced) just for hitting three enemies and Adrenaline Junkie provides +20 Handling and ×1.33 damage on a grenade kill for 4.5s (5s enhanced), to help kill chunkier enemies. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller

dimwishlist:item=970034755&perks=1392496348,679225683,3523296417,11612903

// Giver's Blessing - PvE Minors god 4
// (Fluted Barrel, Smallbore, Arrowhead Brake, Chambered Compensator, Corkscrew Rifling, Polygonal Rifling), (High-Caliber Rounds, Armor-Piercing Rounds, Ricochet Rounds, Alloy Mag, Extended Mag, Appended Mag, Flared Magwell, Light Mag), (Impromptu Ammunition), (Kinetic Tremors, One for All)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing minor add groups both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content. Giver's Blessing is a rapid fire frame, which provides a useful reload animation modifier of from ×0.9 at half-full to ×0.8 when the magazine's empty. At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are a bit low but, at that's helped at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that Range of 33 translates to 14.88m hipfire and 23.80m ADS before damage drop-off, 53 Stability is ×1.1031 flinch resistance, 38 Handling is 0.41s ready, 0.32s ADS and 0.38s stow speed, 47 Reload Speed is a 1.94s reload (1.55s when empty, with the frame intrinsic) and Magazine Size is 47 (max 70). Controller players will probably need a bit of assistance from the barrel perk to control the recoil, but M+KB can focus on boosting handling. As the magazine perk, the combat effect rounds are all here, or look to boost magazine size or Reload Speed. In the first trait perk column, if you're if you're building into the Ammo Generation stat with armour and weapon mods, Impromptu Ammunition offers around a ×1.2 scalar on top. In the second column, Kinetic Tremors provides 6m AoE damage after 12 hits (11 enhanced) to help deal with add crowds, or One for All generates a ×1.35 damage boost for 10s (11s enhanced) just for hitting three enemies to help kill chunkier enemies. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller

// Agape - PvE Minors god 2
// (Arrowhead Brake, Fluted Barrel, Corkscrew Rifling, Polygonal Rifling), (Alloy Mag, Flared Magwell), (Heal Clip), (Firefly)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing minor add groups both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content, particularly with solar builds. Agape, as a heavy burst frame, provides the best damage output against minors and offers as its intrinsic perk a little additional flinch resistance when ADSed. At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are middling, with a boost at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that Range of 64 translates to 21.76m hipfire and 34.82m ADS before damage drop-off, 28 Stability is ×1.0150 flinch resistance, 29 Handling is 0.39s ready, 0.28s ADS and 0.43s stow speed, 21 Reload Speed is a 3.13s reload and Magazine Size is 14 (max 28). For barrel and magazine perk choices, Agape desperately needs Handling and Reload Speed as a priority. If you want to use Heal Clip in the first trait perk column, for the ×2 Cure (140 HP) and ×1 Cure on allies within 15m when you finish a reload within 5.3s after a kill, you really do need to sort the reload out or the window is really short, and if you're in trouble you'll likely be dead before the animation's complete. Pairing Firefly in the second column is great in this respect - as well as the solar explosion in a 4m radius on a crit kill, you also get +50 Reload Speed (+55 when enhanced). The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. If you're interested, Agape (pronounced Ah-gar-pay) is a Greek word for the highest form of love, characterised by selflessness and unconditional care for others. Recommended MW: Reload Speed, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=1840239774,1431678320,3017780555,3824105627
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=1840239774,3230963543,3017780555,3824105627
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=839105230,1431678320,3017780555,3824105627
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=839105230,3230963543,3017780555,3824105627
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=4090651448,1431678320,3017780555,3824105627
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=4090651448,3230963543,3017780555,3824105627

// Agape - PvE Minors god 3
// (Arrowhead Brake, Fluted Barrel, Corkscrew Rifling, Polygonal Rifling), (Alloy Mag, Flared Magwell), (Rewind Rounds), (Vorpal Weapon, Precision Instrument)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing minor add groups both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content, particularly for melee builds. Agape, as a heavy burst frame, provides the best damage output against minors and offers as its intrinsic perk a little additional flinch resistance when ADSed. At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are middling, with a boost at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that Range of 64 translates to 21.76m hipfire and 34.82m ADS before damage drop-off, 28 Stability is ×1.0150 flinch resistance, 29 Handling is 0.39s ready, 0.28s ADS and 0.43s stow speed, 21 Reload Speed is a 3.13s reload and Magazine Size is 14 (max 28). For barrel and magazine perk choices, Agape desperately needs Handling and Reload Speed as a priority. For melee builds, particularly running a solar subclass, the combination of Pugilist in the first trait perk column generates melee energy on kills, while Incandescent is great for clearing add groups, spreading +30 scorch stacks or +40 with Ember of Ashes (+35/+45 with Ember of Ashes, when enhanced) in a 4m radius on a kill, with scorch/ignition kills counting as weapon kills for Pugilist. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. If you're interested, Agape (pronounced Ah-gar-pay) is a Greek word for the highest form of love, characterised by selflessness and unconditional care for others. Recommended MW: Reload Speed, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=1840239774,1431678320,691659142,4293542123
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=1840239774,3230963543,691659142,4293542123
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=839105230,1431678320,691659142,4293542123
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=839105230,3230963543,691659142,4293542123
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=4090651448,1431678320,691659142,4293542123
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=4090651448,3230963543,691659142,4293542123

// Agape - PvE Minors god 4
// (Arrowhead Brake, Fluted Barrel, Corkscrew Rifling, Polygonal Rifling), (Alloy Mag, Flared Magwell), (Rewind Rounds), (Burning Ambition, Incandescent)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing minor add groups both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content, particularly for Lucky Pants Hunters. Agape, as a heavy burst frame, provides the best damage output against minors and offers as its intrinsic perk a little additional flinch resistance when ADSed. At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are middling, with a boost at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that Range of 64 translates to 21.76m hipfire and 34.82m ADS before damage drop-off, 28 Stability is ×1.0150 flinch resistance, 29 Handling is 0.39s ready, 0.28s ADS and 0.43s stow speed, 21 Reload Speed is a 3.13s reload and Magazine Size is 14 (max 28). For barrel and magazine perk choices, Agape desperately needs Handling and Reload Speed as a priority. For Lucky Pants Hunters, in the first trait perk column Rewind Rounds lets you keep on shooting while building Illegally Modded Holster stacks for up to ×4.5 damage at 10 stacks, refilling 60% (70% when enhanced) of hits back into the magazine when empty. In the second column, for another damage multiplier, Vorpal Weapon plus 10 stacks of IMH boosts damage by ×5.4 against orange and yellow bars or Precision Instrument for up to ×6.15 crit damage at 6 stacks if you can keep hitting crits. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. If you're interested, Agape (pronounced Ah-gar-pay) is a Greek word for the highest form of love, characterised by selflessness and unconditional care for others. Recommended MW: Reload Speed, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=1840239774,1431678320,3418782618,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=1840239774,1431678320,3418782618,555281244
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=1840239774,3230963543,3418782618,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=1840239774,3230963543,3418782618,555281244
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=839105230,1431678320,3418782618,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=839105230,1431678320,3418782618,555281244
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=839105230,3230963543,3418782618,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=839105230,3230963543,3418782618,555281244
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=4090651448,1431678320,3418782618,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=4090651448,1431678320,3418782618,555281244
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=4090651448,3230963543,3418782618,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=4124362340&perks=4090651448,3230963543,3418782618,555281244


// Last Thursday - PvE Minors god 1
// (Arrowhead Brake, Fluted Barrel, Corkscrew Rifling, Polygonal Rifling), (High-Caliber Rounds, Armor-Piercing Rounds, Ricochet Rounds, Alloy Mag, Flared Magwell), (Demolitionist, Rapid Hit), (Kinetic Tremors, One for All) 
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing minor add groups both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content. As an adaptive frame, Last Thursday doesn't have any intrinsic to offer and, to be honest, if you already have a decent strand pulse rifle you can probably pass as the perk pool is PvP oriented. At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are decent with a boost at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that Range of 44 translates to 19.30m hipfire and 32.81m ADS before damage drop-off, 52 Stability is ×1.0800 flinch resistance, 42 Handling is 0.41s ready, 0.38s ADS and 0.40s stow speed, 38 Reload Speed is a 2.01s reload and Magazine Size is 33 (max 48). Controller players will probably need a bit of assistance from the barrel perk to control the recoil, but M+KB can focus on boosting handling. As the magazine perk, the combat effect rounds are all here, or look to boost Reload Speed. For a general purpose roll, in the first trait perk column Demolitionist is great for generating grenade ability energy, and also to refill the magazine on grenade usage, or Rapid Hit improves Stability by up to +25 and Reload Speed by up to +60 with a ×0.92 animation modifier at 5 stacks on rapid crit hits. For damage, Frenzy is always decent for a ×1.15 damage boost and maxing out both Handling and Reload Speed while in combat, Binary Orbit provides a ×1.25 boost to damage for 8.5s (10.5s when enhanced) for getting a kill with an opposite energy type - so any light-based energy kill will proc, or Dragonfly procs a 4.5m AoE explosion on a crit kill to help deal with groups of adds. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller

// Sublimation - PvE Minors god 1
// (Fluted Barrel, Arrowhead Brake, Corkscrew Rifling), (Flared Magwell, Tactical Mag, Alloy Mag), (Rapid Hit, Eddy Current, Impromptu Ammunition), (Rolling Thunder)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing minor add groups both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content, particularly with arc Bolt Charge builds. As a high impact frame, Sublimation is the second-highest damage output scort rifle subfamily, so might be a decent replacement option for longer range encounters. The frame intrinsic provides improved accuracy when stationary or moving slowly. At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are middling benefitting from the boost at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that Range of 72 translates to 41.54m hipfire and 83.08m ADS before damage drop-off, 26 Stability is ×1.0150 flinch resistance, 27 Handling is 0.46s ready, 0.37s ADS and 0.48s stow speed, 27 Reload Speed is a 2.45s reload and Magazine Size is 12 (max 19). The two stats that need the most help from the barrel and mag perks are boosting Handling and Reload Speed - with this being slow firing, there should be time for the reticule to reset between shots. For Arc builds, in the first trait perk column Rapid Hit improves Stability by up to +25 and Reload Speed by up to +60 with a ×0.92 animation modifier at 5 stacks on rapid crit hits or Eddy Current boosts Reload Speed by +20 with a ×0.95 animation multiplier and Handling with a ×0.95 handling animation multiplier for after sprinting for 1.5s (instand proccing and +60 Reload Speed when you're amplified. Alternatively, if you're if you're building into the Ammo Generation stat with armour and weapon mods, Impromptu Ammunition offers around a ×1.2 scalar on top. In the second column, Rolling Storm builds Bolt Charge stacks - 1 stack on a kill, or 2 when amplified - to use with arc builds. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload Speed, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller

// Sublimation - PvE Minors god 2
// (Fluted Barrel, Arrowhead Brake, Corkscrew Rifling), (Flared Magwell, Tactical Mag, Alloy Mag), (Rapid Hit, Eddy Current), (Voltshot)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing minor add groups both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content, particularly with arc builds. As a high impact frame, Sublimation is the second-highest damage output scort rifle subfamily, so might be a decent replacement option for longer range encounters. The frame intrinsic provides improved accuracy when stationary or moving slowly. At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are middling benefitting from the boost at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that Range of 72 translates to 41.54m hipfire and 83.08m ADS before damage drop-off, 26 Stability is ×1.0150 flinch resistance, 27 Handling is 0.46s ready, 0.37s ADS and 0.48s stow speed, 27 Reload Speed is a 2.45s reload and Magazine Size is 12 (max 19). The two stats that need the most help from the barrel and mag perks are boosting Handling and Reload Speed - with this being slow firing, there should be time for the reticule to reset between shots. For Arc builds, in the first trait perk column Rapid Hit improves Stability by up to +25 and Reload Speed by up to +60 with a ×0.92 animation modifier at 5 stacks on rapid crit hits or Eddy Current boosts Reload Speed by +20 with a ×0.95 animation multiplier and Handling with a ×0.95 handling animation multiplier for after sprinting for 1.5s (instand proccing and +60 Reload Speed when you're amplified. The reload is critical for helping proc Voltshot Jolt the next target you hit within 7s for chunk damage on a target and AoE damage against nearby enemies, after reloading within 5.3s of a kill. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload Speed, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller
dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=1840239774,3230963543,247725512,2173046394
dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=1840239774,3230963543,684456054,2173046394
dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=1840239774,106909392,247725512,2173046394
dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=1840239774,106909392,684456054,2173046394
dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=1840239774,1431678320,247725512,2173046394
dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=1840239774,1431678320,684456054,2173046394
dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=839105230,3230963543,247725512,2173046394
dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=839105230,3230963543,684456054,2173046394
dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=839105230,106909392,247725512,2173046394
dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=839105230,106909392,684456054,2173046394
dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=839105230,1431678320,247725512,2173046394

dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=4090651448,106909392,247725512,2173046394
dimwishlist:item=1674692344&perks=4090651448,106909392,684456054,2173046394

// Sublimation - PvE Minors god 3
// (Fluted Barrel, Arrowhead Brake, Corkscrew Rifling), (Flared Magwell, Tactical Mag, Alloy Mag), (Demolitionist, Shoot to Loot, Rapid Hit, Eddy Current), (Redirection, Explosive Payload)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing minor add groups both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content, particularly with arc builds. As a high impact frame, Sublimation is the second-highest damage output scort rifle subfamily, so might be a decent replacement option for longer range encounters. The frame intrinsic provides improved accuracy when stationary or moving slowly. At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are middling benefitting from the boost at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that Range of 72 translates to 41.54m hipfire and 83.08m ADS before damage drop-off, 26 Stability is ×1.0150 flinch resistance, 27 Handling is 0.46s ready, 0.37s ADS and 0.48s stow speed, 27 Reload Speed is a 2.45s reload and Magazine Size is 12 (max 19). The two stats that need the most help from the barrel and mag perks are boosting Handling and Reload Speed - with this being slow firing, there should be time for the reticule to reset between shots. For a general-purpose roll, in the first trait perk column Demolitionist generates grenade ability on kills and reloads your weapon when using a grenade, Shoot to Loot is very useful to pick up ammo bricks and orbs from a safe location, Rapid Hit improves Stability by up to +25 and Reload Speed by up to +60 with a ×0.92 animation modifier at 5 stacks on rapid crit hits, or Eddy Current boosts Reload Speed by +20 with a ×0.95 animation multiplier and Handling with a ×0.95 handling animation multiplier for after sprinting for 1.5s (instant proccing and +60 Reload Speed if you're amplified. As a second column damage perk, Redirection is great to store damage by hitting minor adds, for 2 stacks per hit up to 30 stacks, for use against majors and bosses for ×1.33 damage used at three stacks per shot (×1.5 at two stacks per shot when enhanced). Alternatively, Explosive Payload is a ×1.15 damage boost to bodyshot damage or ×1.085 to crit hits. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload Speed, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller

// Precipial - PvE Majors god 1
// (Full Choke, Barrel Shroud, Corkscrew Rifling), (Tactical Mag, Appended Mag, Assault Mag), (One-Two Punch), (Swashbuckler, Vorpal Weapon, Slideshot)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-Boss PvE-MajorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for burst damage against Elites, Banes, Champions and Minibosses both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content, particularly with melee builds. Precipial doesn't benefit much from the precision frame intrinsic improved recoil direction but it's there anyway! At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are decent, benefitting from the boost at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that 68 Range translates to 5.77mm hipfire or ADS before damage drop-off, 45 Stability is ×1.0313 flinch resistance, 41 Handling is 0.40s ready, 0.36s ADS and 0.43s stow speed, 38 Reload Speed is a 0.80s reload per shall and Magazine Size is 5 (max 8). With one eye on using One-Two Punch, for the barrel perk, Full Choke tightens pellet spread or boost Handling. For the magazine perk, boost the magazine size or Assault Mag improves fire rate slightly, from 65 to 70 RPM. One-Two Punch doesn't appear that often in the first trait perk column - for melee builds, the additional +150% damage - melee damage boosts are now additive rather than multiplicative - for 3s after landing all 12 pellets (10 when enhanced) gives you huge burst damage potential. In the second column for weapon damage, you can pair that with Vorpal Weapon for a flat ×1.15 damage boost to focus down orange and yellow bar enemies or, if you're using this to clear a room of bulky enemies, Swashbuckler's ×1.33 damage for 4.5s (6.5s when enhanced) after a melee kill. Alternatively, you could use Slideshot for on-the-go reloads. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. Amazingly, a single mini-rocket hit can proc One-Two Punch on a target 60m away, which should make for some good YouTube shorts. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload Speed, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-Boss PvE-MajorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller

// Precipial - PvE Majors god 2
// (Full Choke, Barrel Shroud, Corkscrew Rifling), (Tactical Mag, Appended Mag, Assault Mag), (Proximity Power), (Swashbuckler, Binary Orbit, Discord, Vorpal Weapon)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for add-clearing bulkier enemies both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content, particularly with melee builds. Precipial doesn't benefit much from the precision frame intrinsic improved recoil direction but it's there anyway! At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are decent, benefitting from the boost at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that 68 Range translates to 5.77mm hipfire or ADS before damage drop-off, 45 Stability is ×1.0313 flinch resistance, 41 Handling is 0.40s ready, 0.36s ADS and 0.43s stow speed, 38 Reload Speed is a 0.80s reload per shall and Magazine Size is 5 (max 8). Use the barrel perk to improve Handling and, for the magazine perk, boost the magazine size or Assault Mag improves fire rate slightly, from 65 to 70 RPM. For melee builds, in the first trait perk column, Proximity Power can stack three times to provide +15 (+18 when enhanced) to your Melee stat per stack - a total a +45 (+54) for 10s, refreshable on further kills. In the second column, for damage, Swashbuckler is a natural pairing for an up to ×1.33 damage bonus after a melee kill or Vorpal Weapon provides a flat ×1.15 against orange and yellow bar enemies. Alternatively, Binary Orbit pairs with a stasis or strand weapon for a ×1.25 damage boost for 8.5s (10.5 enhanced) after a kill with an opposite class of energy or, particularly for double special loadouts, Discord generates free ammo for 7s (8s enhanced) after a kill with another weapon. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. Amazingly, a single mini-rocket can hit a target 60m away, which should make for some good YouTube shorts. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload Speed, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller

// Ulterior Observation - PvE Minors god 1
// (Polygonal Rifling, Arrowhead Brake, Fluted Barrel), (Extended Mag, Appended Mag, High-Caliber Rounds, Armor-Piercing Rounds, Ricochet Rounds, Flared Magwell), (Subsistence), (Killing Tally, Binary Orbit)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing bulkier adds in both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content. Ulterior Observation, as an aggressive frame LMG doesn't really have a frame intrinsic outside of "high damage, high recoil". At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are decent, benefitting from the boost at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that 47 Range translates to 29.55m hipfire or 47.28m when ADS before damage drop-off, 46 Stability is ×1.0650 flinch resistance, 45 Handling is 0.39s ready, 0.40s ADS and 0.36s stow speed, 32 Reload Speed is a glacial 5.24s reload and Magazine Size is 60 (max 87). You probably will need a bit of help with the barrel perk to control the recoil. With the magazine perk, maximise the size, use of the combat effect perks or maybe a little more help with the reload speed. For a pretty much all-purpose roll for add clearing, that can also be used for the occasional focusing down of harder enemies, the pairing of Subsistence in the first trait perk column to refill 10% of the magazine (20% when enhanced) from reserves, or Demolitionist to generate grenade energy to use to refill the magazine on a grenade use, either of which can work with Killing Tally for an up to ×1.3 damage boost for killing 3 enemies until you swap or reload or Binary Orbit's ×1.25 damage for 8.5s (10.5s when enhanced) for getting a light-based kill using weapons or abilities. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. Recommended MW: Stability or Handling, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller

// Ulterior Observation - PvE Minors god 2
// (Polygonal Rifling, Arrowhead Brake, Fluted Barrel), (Extended Mag, Appended Mag, High-Caliber Rounds, Armor-Piercing Rounds, Ricochet Rounds, Flared Magwell), (Headstone), (Rimestealer)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing bulkier adds in both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content, particularly with stasis builds. Ulterior Observation, as an aggressive frame LMG doesn't really have a frame intrinsic outside of "high damage, high recoil". At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are decent, benefitting from the boost at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that 47 Range translates to 29.55m hipfire or 47.28m when ADS before damage drop-off, 46 Stability is ×1.0650 flinch resistance, 45 Handling is 0.39s ready, 0.40s ADS and 0.36s stow speed, 32 Reload Speed is a glacial 5.24s reload and Magazine Size is 60 (max 87). You probably will need a bit of help with the barrel perk to control the recoil. With the magazine perk, maximise the size, use of the combat effect perks or maybe a little more help with the reload speed. For Stasis builds, maybe with a double special loadout so this is your primary add-clearing weapon, the combination of Headstone to generate Stasis Crystals on crit kills with Rimestealer to generate Frost Armor stacks for destroying a crystal or frozen target (2 stacks when enhanced) is a tried and tested pairing. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. Recommended MW: Stability or Handling, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller

// Agape - PvE Minors god 1
// (Arrowhead Brake, Fluted Barrel, Corkscrew Rifling, Polygonal Rifling), (Alloy Mag, Flared Magwell), (Rewind Rounds), (Burning Ambition, Incandescent)
//notes:Inspired by @PodvsEnemies episode 150 from 19 August 2025 (https://open.spotify.com/episode/09YmSx1l928T7hFnj7Kvxi?si=eb827f2ac1974a14) with @CourtProjects, @ImpetusAlways and @Saint_Kabr (PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller): First-choice PvE roll for clearing minor add groups both general at-level or better, and end-game underleveled content, particularly with solar builds. Agape, as a heavy burst frame, provides the best damage output against minors and offers as its intrinsic perk a little additional flinch resistance when ADSed. At base, by comparison with its peers, the stats are middling, with a boost at Tier 4/5 when barrel and magazine perks are enhanced - d2foundry.gg calculates that Range of 64 translates to 21.76m hipfire and 34.82m ADS before damage drop-off, 28 Stability is ×1.0150 flinch resistance, 29 Handling is 0.39s ready, 0.28s ADS and 0.43s stow speed, 21 Reload Speed is a 3.13s reload and Magazine Size is 14 (max 28). For barrel and magazine perk choices, Agape desperately needs Handling and Reload Speed as a priority. In the first trait perk column Rewind Rounds partially mitigates the problems with reload speed refilling 60% (70% when enhanced) of hits back into the magazine when empty. In the second column, for solar builds, Burning Ambition is here for end-game content for use against beefier single targets, although you will probably need a scorch source from an ability to start things off, or Incandescent is great for clearing add groups, spreading +30 scorch stacks or +40 with Ember of Ashes (+35/+45 with Ember of Ashes, when enhanced) in a 4m radius on a kill. The Exhaustive Research Origin Trait is very good for PvE - ADS for 1s at an enemy up to 60m away, and the next shot will fire a mini-rocket - these are affected by and can proc rocket-based perks and traits too - with a 5s cooldown. If you're interested, Agape (pronounced Ah-gar-pay) is a Greek word for the highest form of love, characterised by selflessness and unconditional care for others. Recommended MW: Reload Speed, with your preferred choice of mod/enhanced mod to boost weapon stats, ammo regeneration, or elemental pickups for builds - and don't forget to check any available seasonal fragile mods.|tags:PvE PvE-MinorSpec PvE-God PvE-EndGame M+KB Controller
